remarks: The Axiom of Regularity using abbreviations.  This form with the intersection arguments commuted (compared to ~ zfreg ) is formally more convenient for us in some cases.  Axiom Reg of [BellMachover] p. 480. (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-2003.)

zfreg2.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
zfreg2 $p |- ( A =/= (/) -> E. x e. A ( A i^i x ) = (/) ) $.
$d A x $.
